contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|Stand|stand}} '''Stand''' may refer to: {{tocright}} *The upright position of [[standing]] *[[Stand, Greater Manchester]], a residential area in the Metropolitan Borough of Manchester, England *A [[partnership (cricket)]] in cricket *[[STAND: A Student Anti-Genocide Coalition]] *[[The Stand Comedy Club]], in Edinburgh, Glasgow and Newcastle upon Tyne *[[ST And]], a variable star ==Objects== *A [[standing frame]], an assistive technology supporting a person who could not otherwise stand erect *A [[stand (drill pipe)]] includes 2 or 3 joints of drill pipe connected together and ''stood'' in the derrick on a drilling rig *A [[music stand]] *A [[cymbal stand]] *A [[bus stand]], a place where public service vehicles are parked between journeys *A [[kickstand]] of a bicycle or motorcycle *An area of seating in a [[stadium]] ==Music== *''[[Stand!]]'', the fourth album by Sly & the Family Stone, considered among their best work **[[Stand! (song)|"Stand!" (song)]], the title of that album's second single *[[Stand (R.E.M. song)|"Stand" (R.E.M. song)]], a 1988 song by R.E.M. *[[Stand (Jewel song)|"Stand" (Jewel song)]], a 2003 song by Jewel *[[Stand (Rascal Flatts song)|"Stand" (Rascal Flatts song)]], a 2007 song by Rascal Flatts *[[Stand (Lenny Kravitz song)|"Stand" (Lenny Kravitz song)]], a 2011 song by Lenny Kravitz *[[Stand (Poison song)|"Stand" (Poison song)]], 1993 *[[Stand (Michael W. Smith album)|''Stand'' (Michael W. Smith album)]], 2006 *[[Stand (Avalon album)|''Stand'' (Avalon album)]], a 2006 album by Avalon *[[Stand (Breaking the Silence album)|''Stand'' (Breaking the Silence album)]], 2007 *[[Stand (Irish band)]], a New Yorkâ€“based Dublin four-piece band *[[The Stand (song)|"The Stand" (song)]], a 2011 song by Mother Mother *"The Stand, a song by Hillsong United from their 2006 album ''[[United We Stand (Hillsong United album)|United We Stand]]'' *"The Stand", a song by [[The Alarm]] ==Television, books== *''[[The Stand]]'', a 1978 novel by Stephen King **[[The Stand (TV miniseries)|''The Stand'' (TV miniseries)]], a 1994 miniseries based on the novel *[[Stand (JoJo's Bizarre Adventure)]], a supernatural power in the manga, anime and game series ''JoJo's Bizarre Adventure'' *STAND, an organization fighting against the Virus in the anime ''[[Virus Buster Serge]]'' == See also == *[[The Stands]], English band *[[Stand-in (disambiguation)]] {{disambiguation}}
